meeting_request.purpose: Struggling to keep up with advanced CS courses
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Jose, a third-year Computer Science major. I’ve been taking a lot of technical courses lately, and I’m starting to feel overwhelmed. In my first two semesters, I took two CS classes and two math classes, and I ended up with a B in each one. But now I’m taking three more advanced CS courses, and I’m starting to get a little bit behind. My grades are still okay, but I’m starting to feel like I’m falling behind, and I’m worried that I’m not going to be able to keep up this semester. I’m also taking a couple of electives, including a course on machine learning and another on computer security. I’m not sure if these courses are going to be harder than the ones I’ve already been doing, and I’m worried that I’m going to fall behind again.
